title: Switch payment from QR to copyable UPI ID and update Discord invite link

requirements.text: Update the configured Discord invite URL constant to exactly "https://discord.gg/black-exe" and ensure all Discord links across the site (Contact section, Dashboard Support, Payment panel) use this constant (no hardcoded or outdated Discord URLs).
acceptanceCriteria: All UI locations that link to Discord (ContactSection, DashboardSection Support tab, PaymentPanel) navigate to `https://discord.gg/black-exe`.
No remaining occurrences of the old Discord URL (e.g., `https://discord.gg/blackexe`) are used for navigation.

requirements.text: Remove the QR-code image payment UI from the Dashboard Payment experience and replace it with a UPI-ID-based payment UI that displays the UPI ID "9352000693@axl" and provides a clear copy-to-clipboard control. All user-facing text in this Payment UI must be in English.

quotes: REMOVE QR PHOTO AND PUT UPI ID 9352000693@axl and make it copy able

acceptanceCriteria: The Payment panel no longer renders any QR image (no `` with QR assets, no 'Tap to enlarge', no 'Scan to Pay' QR instructions).
The Payment panel displays the exact UPI ID text `9352000693@axl` prominently inside the existing cyberpunk/glass UI styling.
A copy-to-clipboard control is present and copies `9352000693@axl` to the clipboard.
After copying, the UI provides a visible confirmation state in English (e.g., 'Copied' / 'UPI ID copied').

requirements.text: Change the panel "BUY NOW" interaction so that when a user clicks BUY NOW (or clicks a panel card), the app shows the UPI payment details (UPI ID and copy action) and provides WhatsApp/Discord options to confirm paymentâ€”without immediately opening WhatsApp for purchase. The confirmation options must remain available via buttons/links in the payment view.

quotes: JB wo buy pa click kra aga upi id aye or pay conform ka lia Whatsapp ha discord aye

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a panel card or its "BUY NOW" button opens an in-app payment step that shows the UPI ID `9352000693@axl` with copy-to-clipboard and the payment confirmation buttons (WhatsApp and Discord).
The prior behavior of instantly opening WhatsApp on panel click/BUY NOW is removed for this interaction.
The WhatsApp confirmation link still uses the existing WhatsApp number constant `+923137863480` and remains URL-encoded.
If a panel name is available from the clicked card, the WhatsApp payment-proof message includes the panel name (using the existing `buildPaymentProofWhatsAppLink(panelName?)` capability).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, and anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep the backend as-is (single Motoko actor remains empty unless strictly necessary); this change should be frontend-only.
Use English for all new/updated user-facing text in the modified payment/buy flow UI.
nonGoals: Do not implement actual payment verification or automatic payment status checking.
Do not change the WhatsApp number (+923137863480).
Do not add new backend storage, admin panels, or order management.
